gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 128, Heat 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Heat, 128-120. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 28 points and eight assists for the Thunder, with Jalen Williams adding 19 points, a career-high 12 assists, and nine rebounds in the victory. Bam Adebayo tallied 25 points, 11 rebounds, and six assists for the Heat in the defeat. The Thunder improve to 25-11 in the regular season, while the Heat fall to 21-16.
